During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons [[Summit Shaper]] (Sword) and [[Memory of Dust]] (Catalyst) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

During the event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons [[Lithic Blade]] (Claymore) and [[Lithic Spear]] (Polearm), as well as the 4-star weapons [[The Flute]] (Sword), [[Eye of Perception]] (Catalyst), and [[Sacrificial Bow]] (Bow) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
